Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will meet your needs perfectly. Considering its worth to you, I am offering this remarkable item at a special price of $14,000. This offer is designed to provide you with an excellent opportunity to acquire a high-quality asset at a competitive price. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
